channel.title: [PI] Need Help
channel.description: Does anyone know how to do/fix the followings: 1. Vengeance 2. Make a weapon 1 hit ko 3. When you barrage a NPC, you run up (make it so you stand still) 4. Add a panel or a command that tells all the player that are online 5. Show Prayer/Hp over character's head like 69/99.

item.title: [PI] Need Help
item.dc:creator: @0_v_b0w_v_0 0_v_b0w_v_0
item.description:
